head.title: Little Cause for Hope On a Mideast Accord

hedline.hl1: Little Cause for Hope On a Mideast Accord

block.p: President Clinton will meet separately today in New York with the Palestinian leader, Yasir Arafat, and Israel's Prime Minister, Ehud Barak, but there is little sign that their standoff will end soon.

President Clinton will meet separately today in New York with the Palestinian leader, Yasir Arafat, and Israel's Prime Minister, Ehud Barak, but there is little sign that their standoff will end soon.

Mr. Clinton is expected to try to impress a sense of urgency upon them. But Mr. Arafat has remained unmovable in his demand for Palestinian sovereignty over a holy site in Jerusalem that is also sacred to Jews, and Mr. Barak is starting to give up hopes of a deal, aides say.
